quickcarpet-fixes.rule.crystalExplodeOnE: Fixes End Crystals not exploding when damaged from explosions. End Crystal chaining
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.spongeUpdateFix.d: Fixes sponges not giving block updates when absorbing water
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.hopperUpdateFix.d: Fixes hoppers not giving block updates when placed while powered
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.hopperUpdateFix.e: invisibleHopperFix is automatically enabled when used [Youtube Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVOONJ1OY44)
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.observerUpdateFix: Fixes observers not giving block updates when retracted and immediately repowered
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.stringTagExploitF: Fixes StringTag Exploits due to StringTag writeUTF() not respecting readUTF() Limits causing crashes internally
This was the cause of ChunkRegen, and the book dupe. Both patched, although StringTag is still broken
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.blockCollisionChe: Fixes incorrect block collision checks for players
This bug allows you to teleport to the end at your overworld position, amongst many other problems
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.blockUpdateOrderF: Fixes issues where block updates are directional. Changes block update order from XYZ to XZY
Warning! This changes how block updates are done and could effect some contraptions
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.extendedBlockUpda: Changes block updates that go 2 blocks out, so they have the same block update order
Changes extended block update order from YZX to XZY - Warning! This changes how some block updates are done and could effect some contraptions
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.comparatorUpdateF: Fixes the issue where comparators don't always get updated correctly
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.updateSuppression: Prevents update suppression from working. When the stack is reached, the following updates are moved to the next tick
This does not prevent stack overflow exploits, it simple makes sure to update block after
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.incorrectBounceLo: Fixes some entities not bouncing on slime blocks and getting stuck
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.incorrectBubbleCo: Fixes some entities getting stuck in bubble columns
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.directionalBlockS: Fixes movement slowdown being calculated based on last block in search. Uses the slowest value instead
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.catsBreakLeadsDur: Fixes cats sometimes breaking there leads after giving a gift
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.petsBreakLeadsDur: Fixes Leashed pets teleporting to the player when reloaded, breaking there leads
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endermanDontUpdat: Fixes enderman not updating the block they place correctly
Only applies if you use datapacks or mods. E.x. Enderman placing a wither skull will not spawn a wither
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endermanUselessMi: Fixes enderman constantly trying to teleport when in a minecart under daylight
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.railInvalidUpdate: Fixes rails updating other rails before checking if they are in a valid location
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.railMissingUpdate: Fixes rails not updating other rails on being moved, allowing for invalid states
Fixes rails not updating other rails after being moved
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endVoidRingsFix.d: Fixes the void rings in the end, which is a floating point error
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.sleepingDelaysFal: Fixes fall damage being delayed by sleeping, fall damage will be removed instead
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.tntCantUseNetherP: Fixes TNT Entity not being able to go through nether portals
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.fallingBlocksCant: Fixes Falling Blocks not being able to go through nether portals
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.spawnChunkEntitie: Fixes Spawn Chunks not ticking entities and block entities if no player online
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.repairCostItemNot: Fixes Named Blocks not stacking due to useless RepairCost tag
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.playerBlockCollis: Fixes multiple bugs related to effects happening only when player center in block instead of hitbox
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.witchHutsSpawnInc: Fixes incorrect cat types spawning inside swamp huts
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.hardcodedSeaLevel: Fixes incorrect sea level height being used when datapacks change the sea height
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.fishingOutsideWat: Fixes being able to fish outside of water
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.xpOrbCollisionFix: Fixes experience orbs treating flowing lava as a full block
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.conversionFix.des: Fixes multiple different mob conversions, not transferring all the correct nbt
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.explosionBreaksIt: Fixes Explosions being able to destroy item frames in water
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.movingBlocksDestr: Fixes Moving Blocks from destroying path blocks
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.witherGolemSpawni: Fixes Withers and Golems not spawning due to replaceable blocks being in the way
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.illegalBreakingFi: Fixes Breaking blocks that should not be able to be broken using headless pistons
Illegal blocks are any blocks that have a hardness value of -1.0F
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.headlessPistonFix: Fixes being able to make and use Headless Pistons
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.sleepingResetsThu: Fixes the thunder timer being reset whenever players sleep
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.duplicateBlockUpd: Fixes some redstone components sending duplicated block updates
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.trapdoorMissingUp: Fixes some blocks not popping off when a trapdoor opens
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.uselessDetectorRa: Fixes the detector rail giving useless comparator updates on entity collision
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.beeStuckInVoidFix: Fixes bees getting stuck in the void due to gravity being disabled
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.invulnerableEndCr: Fixes being able to make permanent invulnerable end crystals
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.sculkSensorPrecis: Fixes signal strength being inaccurate and skipping odd signal strengths due to precision loss with distance
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.creeperPortalFuse: Fixes creepers resetting there fuse duration when travelling through a nether portal after being ignited by flint & steel
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.soulSpeedIncorrec: Fixes soul speed enchantment from damaging boots when riding a vehicle
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endCrystalPlacing: Fixes placing end crystals too early not re-summoning the Ender Dragon
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.respawnDragonWith: Fixes being able to respawn the ender dragon using only 2 ender crystals instead of the intended 4
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.treeTrunkLogicFix: Fixes trees considering the bottom block as a trunk and modifying leaves because of it
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.uselessSelfBlockU: Fixes blocks using updateNeighbors() on blocks next to them, making itself get a block update even though it does not accept block updates
Some blocks do accept block updates, although we make sure to update them correctly
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.tntMinecartExplod: Fixes Tnt Minecarts being able to explode twice, killing their own drops
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.breakAnythingDoor: Fixes Zombies & Vindicators being able to break any block where a door was
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.transparentBlocks: Fixes Transparent blocks placed between bookshelves and enchanting tables negating bonuses received
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.chestUsablePastWo: Fixes chests being accessible outside the world border by placing a chest near it
We do this by preventing chests from merging with other chests outside of the world border
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.itemFramePlaysSou: Fixes item frames playing a sound when they are read from nbt
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.incorrectNbtCheck: Fixes commands not allowing all nbt tags to work correctly
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endPortalRemovesE: Fixes the end portal removing your status effects when going from the overworld to the end
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.inconsistentRedst: Fixes burnt-out redstone torches having inconsistent behavior for turning on again
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.foxesDropItemsWit: Fixes gamerule doMobLoot not effecting foxes from dropping their items
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.instantFluidFlowi: Fixes fluids being able to instantly flow!
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.saferItemTransfer: Changes the code to use less copy calls, and instead pass references when possible
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.sculkSensorBiasFi: Fixes the sculk sensor having a directional bias with wool occlusion
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.beeNotLeavingHive: Fixes bees not leaving the hive in the end & nether due to weather conditions
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.hangingEntityTrig: Fixes item frames & paintings being able to interact with pressure plates & tripwire hooks, causing them to not de-power
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.boatsTakeFallDama: Fixes boats breaking and giving fall damage under certain circumstances
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.boatsDontTakeFall: Fixes boats not being destroyed by fall damage
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.buriedTreasureAlw: Fixes buried treasure always generating in the center of a chunk
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.incorrectFallDama: Fixes incorrect fall distance calculations causing fall distance to build up over time with leads
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.voidKillsLoyaltyT: Fixes the void killing loyalty tridents, even though they should come back to the player
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endermanLowerPier: Fixes piercing projectiles lowering there piercing when 'hitting' an enderman
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.projectileNotDete: Fixes placing a button/pressure plate inside of a projectile not activating it
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.arrowEffectsBypas: Fixes arrows of harming bypassing Totems of Undying
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.mobsConvertingWit: Fixes mobs continuing to convert even if the block is no longer there
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.mobsIgnoreOwnerOn: Fixes Mobs ignoring 'Owner' when picking up loot
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.redstoneComponent: Fixes redstone torch/repeater/comparator update order when being broken, causing incorrect update order
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.velocitySeparateA: Fixes player velocity on X and Z axis being cancelled separately at low values
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.armorStandMissing: Fixes ArmorStands losing functionality due to 'optimizations'
The marker tag will still prevent interaction though
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.endermanTeleportW: Fixes enderman teleporting when they have the NoAI tag
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.redstoneRedirecti: Fixes redstone redirection missing updates on redirecting
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.pistonsPushWaterl: Fixes being able to push waterlogged blocks while retaining the waterlogged state using a short pulse
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.tileDropsAffected: Fixes tile drops at the world border spawning at the wrong location
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.entityRandomCrack: Fixes players being able to crack there player seed
This makes it so random is shared between all entities. Which is a good performance boost recommended that you set this on permanently, and restart the server for best results
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.worldBorderCollis: Fixes world border collision rounding to blocks for entity collisions
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.detectorRailOffse: Fixes comparator signal ending prematurely due to offset block updates
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.placeBlocksOutsid: Fixes being able to place blocks outside of the world border
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.incorrectPistonWo: Fixes pistons being able to push blocks outside of the world border
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.explosionsBypassW: Fixes explosions being able to destroy blocks outside of the world border
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.playerStepEventFi: Fixes players sending the STEP event before the HIT_GROUND event
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.projectileMissing: Fixes projectiles sending the PROJECTILE_LAND event when landing on a vibration occluding block
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.boatMissingOcclus: Fixes boats sending the SPLASH event when ridden over a vibration occluding block
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.spawnEggOffsetEve: Fixes spawn eggs having an offset game event when spawning an entity
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.spawnEggMissingOc: Fixes Spawning entities using spawn eggs on vibration occluding blocks not occluding
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.spawnEggMissingEv: Fixes Spawning entities using spawn eggs on entities not creating ENTITY_PLACE game event
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.minecartMissingOc: Fixes minecarts sending the ENTITY_PLACE event when placed on a vibration occluding block
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.villagerDiscountI: Fixes villagers not giving a discount if you log out while they are being cured
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.foxesGoToOriginDu: Fixes foxes pathfinding to origin (0,0) during a thunderstorm
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.villagerToWitchBe: Fixes villagers converting to witches while sleeping, not changing the bed occupancy
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reloadUpdateOrder: Fixes reload update order for tile entities
Fixes instant wires randomly breaking - Effective after chunk reload
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.armorStandNegateL: Fixes armor stands not taking damage in lava
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.armorStandNegateC: Fixes armor stands not being damaged by cactus
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.tripwireNotDisarm: Fixes tripwires not being disarmed correctly
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.powderedSnowOpaci: Fixes powder snow letting light pass through it
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.invisibleHopperFi: Fixes hoppers being invisible when placed next to a powered block
It fixes clients not being able to see the hopper, by redrawing them if powered
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.blueWitherSkullNo: Fixes Wither skull projectiles not saving if its charged/blue in there nbt
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.tagKeyMemoryLeakF: Fixes a memory leak within the new TagKey system
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.nocomExploitFix.d: Prevents the NoCom Exploit from being able to crash the server
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.nocomExploitFix.e: There is a fabric mod that is able to do this in vanilla!
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.structureManagerC: Fixes the structure manager not being able to load snbt versions of nbt files
This makes it possible for structure blocks to load snbt files also. Should not be used in survival or for datapacks, since its slower than nbt
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.stepAndDestroyBlo: Fixes the stepAndDestroyBlockGoal using the origin without first checking if its valid
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.hopperMinecartSlo: Fixes hopper minecarts being 4x slower at [0,0,0]
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.nonSolidBlocksBre: Fixes cactus breaking when moving a non-solid block next to them with a piston
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedPoweredR: Makes rails faster by removing most updates on themselves, duplicate updates, and doing rail search internally

This kind of prevents update suppression using a normal suppressor. It requires an angled suppressor to work! This probably changes some rail behavior although so far does not seem to do so. Does change amount of block updates tho
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedTicketMa: Initial made for Lithium, although was not exactly vanilla behavior. This is a very small optimization!
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedRandom.d: Changes many of the main Random() calls to use XoroShiro128++ instead
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedRandom.e: This will break anything related to random, technically still possible to crack*.  Recommended that you set this on permanently, and restart the server for best results
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedBiomeAcc: Optimized the getBiome call to be 25% - 75% faster
This is a fully vanilla optimization. This can optimize the client also, go check Blanket-client-tweaks for that
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedRecipeMa: Optimized the RecipeManager getFirstMatch call to be up to 3x faster

This is a fully vanilla optimization. Improves: [Blast]Furnace/Campfire/Smoker/Stonecutter/Crafting/Sheep Color Choosing. This was mostly made for the auto crafting table, since the performance boost is much more visible when the rule is in use
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.optimizedFurnaces: Optimized the Furnace code drastically. Improving expensive checks, and expensive recipe lookups
This is a fully vanilla optimization. Improves: Furnace, Blast Furnace, Smoker, & any furnace extension. This is incredibly visible in modded scenarios
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.giveCommandDupeFi: Fixes being able to dupe items using the /give command
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.nbtDataDupeFix.de: Fixes /data duping inventories when modifying entity data
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.beeDupeFix.descri: Fixes bees duplicating while trying to load a beehive/beenest in unloaded chunks
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.breakSwapGeneralI: Fixes a general item dupe using shulker boxes
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.stringDupeFix.des: Fixes a string dupe using water & tripwire hooks
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.tripwireHookDupeF: Fixes a tripwire hook dupe using doors & trapdoors
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.horseDupeFix.desc: Fixes a donkey/llama/horse dupe that is possible by using a client-side mod
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.mobsSpawnOnMoving: Fixes mobs being able to spawn on moving pistons
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.geodeLavalogFix.d: Fixes an edge case within geodes where it will waterlog a block next to lava, due to missing fluid check
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.crossDimensionTel: Fixes client stats being lost when teleporting between dimensions
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceTarget: Re-introduces target blocks being permanently powered when moved by pistons
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceLightn: Re-introduces lightning rods being permanently powered when moved by pistons
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroducePortal: Re-introduces general item dupe using dolphins, and some other dimension change dupes
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceFlintA: Re-introduces 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceDonkey: Re-introduces multiplayer donkey/llama dupe bug based on disconnecting while riding donkey/llama
This has not been tested in 1.18 and may not work!
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceOnlyAu: Re-introduces only saving during autosaves instead of any time

Reverts 'saving chunks whenever there is time spare to reduce autosave spikes' from 20w12a. This makes your hard drive work overtime, so people with slow drives might suffer from this. This fixes that!
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceVeryAg: Re-introduces very aggressive saving by removing the chunk save cooldown that was added in 22w05a
For obvious reasons, this does not work when `reIntroduceOnlyAutoSaveSaving` is enabled
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceFallin: Re-introduces falling blocks giving block updates during the entity phase changed in 22w03a
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.lightningKillsDro: Fixes Lightning killing the items that drop from entities it kills
Gives pistons the ability to double retract without side effects
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.repeaterPriorityF: Fixes Quick pulses getting lost in repeater setups
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.maxChunksSavedPer: Allows you to change the max amount of chunks that can save per autosave
If your server has large lag spikes due to chunk saving, you can lower this number.
Allows you to change the max amount of chunks that can save per tick for the 1.18 chunk saving system
This is for the system which just attempt to save chunks every tick. Max chunks saved per tick
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.delayBetweenAutoS: Allows you to change the delay between autosaves in ticks
Shortening this number will make your server save more often which will also spread the load on the server
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.maxTickLatency.de: Allows you to change max tick delay before a task is cancelled
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.maxTickLatency.ex: Lower value raises the task leniency. Basically lower number means higher chance of success
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.statusUpdateDelay: Allows you to change how long the server player list wait before updating
delay is in nanoseconds. Default is 5 seconds (5000000000) [1m,10s,5s,1s]
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.chunkSaveCooldown: Allows you to change the chunk save cooldown added in 22w05a

Set to 10s by default, this is the delay between chunks aggressively saving. If your server has large lag spikes due to chunk saving, you can raise this number. For obvious reasons, this rule is disabled when `reIntroduceVeryAggressiveSaving` is enabled
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.parityMovableLigh: Allows pistons to push and pull light blocks
quickcarpet-fixes.rule.parityTerribleCom: Comparators no longer output level 15 if the full block its reading from is powered if there is a container behind it
Relates to [MC-64394](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-64394) which is marked as Works As Intended
